publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-6077 John Wilson: Coatbridge College Wins Workforce Development Award 2010—That the Parliament congratulates Coatbridge College on its achievement of winning the 2010 Workforce Development (Up to 50 Employees) Award, sponsored by the SQA, at Scotland’s Colleges Business to College Awards; praises Coatbridge College for addressing a specific and specialised skills gap in a large orthodontic practice; believes that this is well deserved recognition of the dedication and hard work of the staff at Coatbridge College, and considers that this award provides an important example of the many ways in which the college sector continues to support the business community throughout Scotland.
